title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Civilian and Police Officer Self-defense Training with Non-linear Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply nonlinear response strategies with at least 80% accuracy in simulated real-world violence scenarios.
Learners can develop at least three context-specific self-defense manuals through team-based projects.
Learners can identify at least three variables affecting self-defense technique application and propose improvements through peer evaluation and feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
